text: Puppet on a Chain is a 1970 British Dutch crime thriller movie directed by Geoffrey Reeve and Don Sharp. It was based on the 1969 novel of the same name by Alastair MacLean. It stars Sven-Bertil Taube, Barbara Perkins, Alexander Knox, Patrick Allen, Vladek Sheybal, Ania Marson, Stewart F. Lane, Drewe Henley, Henny Orri, Gerry Crampton and Arnold Diamond. ==Other websites== * Category:1970 crime movies Category:1970 thriller movies Category:1970s crime thriller movies Category:British crime thriller movies Category:Dutch crime movies Category:Dutch thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Don Sharp Category:Movies set in Amsterdam Category:Movies set in the Netherlands Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies about heroin addiction
title: Puppet on a Chain (movie)
